folder: Belmont Place & Daniel Low Terrace, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1)
2 Belmont Place, at the S.E. corner of Daniel Low Terrace, showing the A.C. Pouch residence.
May 26, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, another view.
May 26, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.

(3)
A view of the house in a westerly direction.
May 26, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.
title: Richmond: Belmont Place - Daniel Low Terrace

folder: Belmont Place & Daniel Low Terrace, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1) 37 Belmont Place, north side, between Daniel Low Terrace and Vine Street, showing the Pouch residence. Another Pouch residence is at No. 2 Belmont Place.

August 6, 1927.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same, a more distant view. The street at this point makes a sharp bend southward.

P. L. Sperr.
August 6, 1927.
title: Richmond: Belmont Place - Daniel Low Terrace
